subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The Rangers found their rhythm against the Capitals and climbed back into their first-round playoff series, trailing 2-1. Derek Stepan scored the decisive goal for the win in Game 3.
snippet: The Rangers found their rhythm against the Capitals and climbed back into their first-round playoff series, trailing 2-1. Derek Stepan scored the decisive goal for the win in Game 3.
